game.name: 3 Coins At School
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 3 Coins at School is a turn-based game similar to soccer but played with coins on a desk.
game.shortDescriptionEn: 3 Coins at School is a turn-based game similar to soccer but played with coins on a desk.

reviewHighlights.text: Nice little pastime, but sometimes a win either feels too easy or totally random. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i08YFoxEcyc&t=693s
Is there a similar game about 300 dollars?
